name: Home (itch) (deerful)
description:
If the game is unresponsive, this seems to be an iframe bug. Hitting reset should fix it.

If you're interested in the context for this game, it was made as an accompaniment to an 8-bit EP I released here. You can buy it either as a download or on USB with four tracks of music (indie pop, vocals and bleeps - three original tracks and a Mountain Goats cover), a papercraft model, and some wallpapers.

This is a remake of Jelpi by Zep at Lexaloffle with some additional functionality.
